message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $130. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $110 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $120?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe $110 would be a fair price for the product. I hope you can meet me halfway.
